segments.text: I come to try my new suit . Here's the receipt .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please wait a minute . I'll fetch it for you . Here it is . Please try it on and take a look at the mirror . How do you like it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Aren't the trousers a little too long ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If you think so , we'll shorten the legs a bit . It'll take about twenty minutes .
segments.speaker: S2
